result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rashaad R. Lumpkins

records.addlTxt:
11:48 AM Defendant Rashaad R. Lumpkins not in court.  Attorney Jordan W. Feest appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
The defendant fails to appear for today's status conference. The jury trial is removed from the calendar. State requests a warrant.
The Court authorizes a warrant for the defendant.
Status conference on November 1, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Report from Public Defender indicating no attorney has been appointed yet.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant wants to have a different attorney.   Defendant is willing to withdraw his speedy trial demand.   Court grants the motion to withdraw.   
Jury trial set for 01-10-23 at 8:30 a.m.   Status conference set for 09-28-22 at 1:45 p.m.    
Minutes.
Status conference on September 28, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Pre-trial conference on December 16, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
Jury trial on January 10, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Final status/scheduling conference on September 23, 2022 at 11:00 am.

3:36 pm - Defendant Rashaad R. Lumpkins appeared by video, in custody, at Manitowoc County Jail.  Attorney Brian Thomas Coe appeared by video for Rashaad R. Lumpkins.  Attorney Jordan W. Feest appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives their right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea(s) entered.  Jury calendar.
Further proceedings scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Scheduling conference on November 16, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Further proceedings on October 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

2:01 PM - Defendant Rashaad R. Lumpkins in court, in custody, at Manitowoc County Jail.  Attorney Brian Thomas Coe appeared by video for Rashaad R. Lumpkins.  Prosecuting attorney Angelina R Scarpelli in court for the State of Wisconsin. Preliminary hearing demanded. Preliminary hearing is set for 09-07-22 at 3:00 p.m.  Court sets bail at $5,000.00 recognizance bond with the condition that he have no contact with T.P.  Defendant refused to sign.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Preliminary hearing on September 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
